document.full_text: timothy f. geithner, the 49-year-old treasury chief, is unrivaled in economic policymaking in the administration, commands respect in asia and europe and is a presidential favorite.
document.title: letter from washington: the indispensable man at the treasury
lines_and_colors: timothy f. geithner, the 49-year-old treasury chief, is unrivaled in economic policymaking in the administration, commands respect in asia and europe and is a presidential favorite.
